0.Name: Sign
0.Text: YE WHO ENTER THESE TREACHEROUS GROUNDS, PREPARE FOR THE BATTLE OF A LIFETIME.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: I can't believe they let me write that on the sign.

1.Name: Me
1.Text: I don't even want to look at it anymore.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: The knight's about to wake up, better get out quick.
